name: Blaster Shooter (rezonated)
description:
Play together with your friends and eliminate them! Shoot your way through!

---This game is still in development, expect bugs and incomplete features---

To play, make sure you have steam opened as it uses steam online subsytem to relay the connection.

Then extract the downloaded zip file and open Blaster.exe

Click host to host a match, and join to join a created match.
